summary: This document is a certification of beneficial ownership related to an account opened by Jeffrey E. Epstein on behalf of a legal entity, Neptune, LLC. It details the ownership structure and responsibilities associated with the account, highlighting Epstein's role as the sole member and significant manager of the entity.

persons.name: Jeffrey E. Epstein
persons.context: Jeffrey E. Epstein is identified as the sole member of Neptune, LLC and is responsible for managing the legal entity.

locations: 6100 Red Hook Quarter, B3, St. Thomas, USVI 00802
keyFacts: Jeffrey E. Epstein is the sole member of Neptune, LLC.
The document certifies Epstein's ownership of 25 percent or more of the equity interests in Neptune, LLC.
The account opening certification was completed on February 24, 2018.
The address for Neptune, LLC is listed as 6100 Red Hook Quarter, B3, St. Thomas, USVI 00802.
The document includes a certification statement regarding the accuracy of the information provided.
